transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Sir good morning IndiaMART se baat kar rahi hu. Aap apna screenshot de dijiye sir jaha pe aap login kar rahe hai aur login nahi ho raha hai.
Customer: A abhi mai thoda available nahi hu, thik hai. Thoda
Executive: Sir mai aapko bata du login ho gaya hai to koi baat nahi hai sir.
Customer: Nahi login nahi hua aap mera jo dekho na waha pe number hai unke sath contact kijiye.
Executive: Ha.
Customer: Mai ek number de raha hu mere office ka unke sath contact kijiye mai aaj nahi hu leave par hu.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Ek number bol raha hu note karo.
Executive: Ha boliye.
Customer: 700
Executive: Ji sir hum inhi do number pe hi call kar sakte hai 060 wale pe aur ek ye wale pe.
Customer: Nahi nahi 7003939244 Nancy ko boliye is number pe call kare.
Executive: Unko aap bol dijiye Nancy ko whatsapp pe bhej de agar nahi login ho raha hai to.
Customer: Nahi nahi unko call kijiye na. Mai jyada baat nahi kar sakta mai baad me hu baad me.
Executive: Thik hai mai aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer unable to login to IndiaMART.

- Executive asked for screenshot of login page.



Resolution:

- Customer provided an alternate contact number.

- Asked executive to call the provided number.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- Executive to call alternate number.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- login issue, screenshot, alternate contact
